item.description:
Performance. Cover $5 (RI Zydeco, Creole, Swing) Rhode Island school of design 224 Benefit Street, Providence, RI 02903-2711 , Medium Dance Floor, No Smoking
Cover $5, 5:00PM to 8:30PM
They loved our Zydeco music and want
us back. Stay tuned for more
information. Info: (401) 454-6505

Happy New Year! Kay just spoke to Pam (event organizer for RISDI
Museum); she informed her that the Chace Center entrance at 20
North Main St, Providence, will be used for the"Slippery
Sneakers" performance/dance on 11 Feb., 2011; not Benefit St.
entrance!
Looking forward to seeing you all
Claire and
Kay
----------------------------------------------------------------

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Slippery Sneakers Zydeco Band at RISDI, Fri, Feb 11, 2011 at 5PM-8:30PM. Dance/
